control.description-key: Use this control to send email with a SSRS report attached. Please visit - https://www.daymandynamics.com/pcf-email-report/ for more information.

property.name: subject
property.description-key: This determines what is populated in the subject field when the email record is created.

property.name: description
property.description-key: This determines what is populated in the description field when the email record is created.

property.name: reportName
property.description-key: This is the name of the report you will be executing. Example - (MainReport.rdl).

property.name: reportGuid
property.description-key: This is this GUID of the report you will be executing. You can find this GUID in the URL when searching for your report using advanced find.

property.name: attachmentFileName
property.description-key: This determines what the attachment file name will be when the email is created.

property.name: automaticallySendReport
property.description-key: This determines if the email will be automatically sent or not.

property.name: FromEntityType
property.description-key: The logical entity name of the from record. You can select from the entities below.

property.name: From
property.description-key: The GUID of the record you want to set the From field in the email.

property.name: ToEntityType
property.description-key: The logical entity name of the from record. You can select from the entities below.

property.name: To
property.description-key: The GUID of the record you want to set the To field in the email.

property.name: Report_Parameter_Name
property.description-key: This is the SSRS report parameter name that is set for enableprefiltering query.

property.name: Report_FetchXML
property.description-key: This is where you create the FetchXML for running the report against.

property.name: RecordId
property.description-key: This is the GUID of the record you are running the report against. This GUID will be added to the Report FetchXML above where the {0} is added in the XML.

property.name: RegardingObjectId
property.description-key: The record Id for the regarding object field.

property.name: RegardingObjectEntityName
property.description-key: The entity logical name for the regarding object field.
